subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Sweep this--part 99
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
LOL 99! Yeah you have tested all sorts of stuff. White noise, no white noise, echo chambers, no chamber..list goes on. Thats why every box is pretty unique you have an idea...you try it. Thats what I enjoy most about your work!

Misty


--- On Mon, 9/29/08, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

> From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Sweep this--part 99
> To: "Group" <evp-itc@yahoogroups.com>
> Date: Monday, September 29, 2008, 1:07 PM
> Manual sweep with dynamic noise reduction--I'm not sure
> it helps. I've used this is the past, but found
> filtering actually cuts out many voices that were made at
> least in part, out of noise. The function of the box was to
> allow all spirits to speak, not just the ones that one
> presumes should speak. 
>  
>    Frank-S
